features: Upgraded Non-slip & Heat Resistant Full FDA Food Grade Silicone Wrapped Dish Drying Rack: Much sturdier than the stainless steel sink drying rack and will never slide around like a metal one without a coating! The silicone roll up dish drying rack is BPA Free for safe use on fruits, veggies, cake, etc. So the dish racks for kitchen counter can be also used as a trivet to place things that take directly out of the oven! Heat resistant 400°F (204°C) so use it to protect countertops from hot pans.

(The width of the sink must be less than 16.2 inches if choose 18" dish rack.) Multifunctional W/ Perfect Size & Foldable Design: MERRYBOX roll up dish drying rack is available in 4 sizes, suitable for most kitchen sinks and counter. This sink drying rack measures 18" x 13". Full silicone wrapped steel kitchen sink mats can be rolled up to any desired width. NOTE - Please measure your sink before choose for better kitchen organization.

Heavier & Anti-rust : MERRYBOX over the sink dish drying rack has good weight to it and a great non slip silicone grip to keep it in place and to prevent items from sliding off of it. Also, the dish drying rack is sturdy enough to hold large serving bowls and a pasta pot full of water without bending. Our dish rack over sink will never rust with the silicone surface! Welcome to compare.

Space Saving & Easy to Clean: Multipurpose roll up drying rack over sink does not require any assembly, just put it flat over the sink and increase much more counter space than traditional dish drainer easily! The silicone surface just need a rag to wipe cleaning. A great addition as kitchen sink organizer and apartment must haves. It will be a warm gift for new home.

All-In-One Multi-purpose Over The Sink Drying Rack: Multiple-use kitchen essential - dish drying rack, trivet, bottle drying rack, heat insulation mat, colander, prep area, drain some over-watered flower pots, etc - all in one! MERRYBOX provide lifetime warranty for this product. Welcome to contact us if have any needs.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: (The width of the dish rack must be at least 1.8 inches longer then the dish rack.) 4 Sizes & 3 Colors Available: Our Roll-Up Drying Rack is a kitchen essential. Measuring 17" x 13"/18" x 13" /20.5" x 13"/17.5" x 11" in size with grey, black and white color. It fits over most kitchen sinks. The durable silicone cover prevent harm, stain or marks on your kitchen countertops. Friendly Material: High quality food grade silicone is BPA free for safe use on fruits, veggies. The durable multi-purpose Roll-Up Drying Rack is the simple solution for air drying your kitchen cookware and table wares or serves as a place mat, cooling rack or trivet. Heavy Duty: Our Roll-Up Drying Rack can withstand heat up to 400℉ degrees. The inner stainless steel rods can support up to 80 pounds. It is great to use a prep station and trivet. Not recommended for use in the oven or microwave. Save Tons of Space: The problem with most dish racks is they take up space. Our over the sink roll-up dish rack features a flexible design, it rolls up like a sink mat and takes up minimal room. This makes it ideal for any kitchen. Made from stainless steel and coated entirely with food-grade silicone, which keeps the rack completely slip-free.

FDA Food Grade & Non-Slip Silicone ABSOLUTELY FDA food safe grade silicone-coated steel with integrated design. Slippery surface is main reason for shattered glasses and broken dishes. Our premium silicone coating holds the sink drying mat (and your dishes) in place. The silicone coating also prevents rust, keeping your drying rack spotless for years on end. BPA-Free, and Dishwasher safe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great multi-functional addition to our kitchen
reviews.reviewText: I love this roll out dish drying rack though I don't use it primarily for drying dishes. I use it when I wash veggies or fruit, I use it as a rack for things like knives and things I wash by hand and will reuse often or which don't do well in the washing machine. It is rolls up easily and takes up no space and it is sturdy. It even occasionally functions as a bit extra workspace when I put a cutting board on it. This is simply a great addition to our kitchen!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, attractive, easy to place and remove
reviews.reviewText: We have an incredibly useless two bowl kidney shaped stainless steel sink, that is difficult to work in. We finally decided that one side was really only useful as a drying area, and I bought this roll up device. I like the way it looks, it fits perfectly, and it's easy to roll up halfway from either side if something manages to get in the sink. We have relatively hard water so once a week I wipe it down with a sponge on both sides and it looks great again. It seems to have the right degree of rigidity, the finish is non-slip, and if we ever figure out what to do with the second tiny bowl, we can whisk it off the sink easily, roll it up, and store it. Great device, and not very expensive IMO. Recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best product ever
reviews.reviewText: This is wonderful. Adds “extra counter space” for setting things as well as great for drip drying things. So very pleased. Also you can clean your fruits and vegetables and lay on there. Multiple uses and must have for kitchen. Game changer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Rack and Great Service
reviews.reviewText: Item is durable, sturdy, and well crafted. Works like a charm and fits perfectly. Customer service was courteous, quick, professional, and very responsive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very handy for a quick wash.
reviews.reviewText: I’m very happy with this purchase. The material is good. It rolls up and doesn’t take up much space. It doesn’t hold a ton of dishes so it’s not suited for a big wash. It’s nice for setting things on while cooking/baking, more room for prep!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Helpful and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Provides a drying rack area and easy to keep clean. Purchased as a gift

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars OMG! Where has this been all my life?!?
reviews.reviewText: I tend to hand-wash a lot of our kitchen stuff, even when it says they are dishwasher-safe. In the past, I would wash an item, rinse it, and then turn off the water to dry it right away. That was driving me crazy, though not crazy enough to stop hand-washing. When we got a new double sink recently, I was cruising the aisles of my local "big box" hardware store, looking for a new faucet, and other things to make life easier, when I saw one of these racks in a sink that was on display. It was love at first sight. My wife usually rolls her eyes when I bring home a new gadget that she would never use, and this was no different - until I showed her how I was going to use it, and how it would make her life around the sink feel more fulfilled. Now, we both love it and wonder why it took us so long to find something like it. We didn't need a new sink. This would have worked fine on our other one.It is SO multi-functional. I've put hot pots on it, waiting for them to cool down before rinsing. She's using it right now to drain veggies she's cooking for dinner. I put rinsed-off cutting boards between the slats, to hold them upright to drain and let them dry after using them. It rolls or folds out of the way if we need to do something that requires both sinks. We don't have to look for a clean place to store it between uses - we just leave it there. It doesn't need to be screwed-down or glued-down. We just love it.There are a LOT of different racks like this on Amazon and in stores, but I recommend looking for one that is coated in silicone. Completely covered in silicone. Some of the choices I found had bare stainless steel with silicone on the ends of the rods. They might look pretty, but things will slide around on them. Silicone is very flexible, keeps things from sliding around, and can take pretty high heat. Make sure you measure your sink carefully. The main reason I chose this product over others is that it had the size I needed. You don't want it to hang over the edge of the sink or countertop too far. Since it is coated in silicone, you could trim off some excess if you needed some extra room for a smaller sink, but you'd probably be better off just folding or rolling it up to make room.Otherwise, I think you're pretty safe with many of the products. It would work best with an undermount sink that has a lip that goes all the way around it. That would be a cleaner look. I'm not sure how it would work on a sink that isn't undermounted.(Pay no attention to the unfinished look of the sink area. We are remodeling and haven't chosen a new backsplash yet).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A very useful item
reviews.reviewText: Of all the dish drainers, mats and racks I've purchased over the years, this one is the most helpful. It can lay across my sink to help wash veggies. It can spread out and become a cooling rack. But mostly it rolls out and holds my drippy dishes until they are dry. Then, I just roll it up and put it away, and unlike some of the others that take up space, this thing can slip behind or in front of most any cabinet or drawer. I love this thing. And the fact that I can put it in the top rack of my dishwasher, is the headline. Plus, because it is silicone coated, means it's not going to rust. I would definitely buy again and way sooner than I did!

Es de esas cosas que te facilitan la vida. Yo los hagarre en promoción y el precio me parece adecuado, no es un super oferta pero esta bien. Me gusta que las varillas vienen cubiertas de goma, así cuido más los utensilios de la cocina.
